title: Cream Satin Midi Dress with Pleated Skirt
image_prompt: Isolated flat-lay product render of a cream-colored satin midi dress, A-line silhouette, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, pleated skirt, subtle tonal stitching, concealed side zipper, on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture and visible trims
techpack: A-line midi dress in cream satin with short flutter sleeves and V-neckline. Pleated skirt panels, concealed side zipper on left seam, polyester lining for comfort. Tonal stitching throughout. Hem finished with blind stitch.
provenance: Inspired by the trending 'cream' color palette for commercial womenswear.
design_text:
Cream Satin Midi Dress with Pleated Skirt (CR2024-001)
Colors: cream, ivory, warm beige
Fabrics: satin, polyester lining
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short flutter sleeves
Neckline: V-neck
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: pleated skirt, concealed side zipper, tonal topstitching
Techpack: available
